original_text: You have become cruel to me. You have used your strength to attack me. You have become cruel to me. You have used your strength to attack me. You have become cruel to me.
korean_text: 주께서 돌이켜 내게 잔혹하게 하시고 힘 있는 손으로 나를 대적하시나이다

sentences.original_text: You have become cruel to me.
You have used your strength to attack me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 힘을 사용하여 나를 공격했습니다.

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 힘을 사용하여 나를 공격했습니다.
